word_mean: 忌水的：如一种忌水胶质不吸水，遇水即坏
疏水的：缺乏极性基团，因而不溶于水

sentence.Network_en: Molecules with both hydrophilic and hydrophobic groups are called amphipathic or amphiphilic.
sentence.Network_cn: 分子兼有亲水的和疏水的两个基团,叫做两性的或两亲的.

sentence.Network_en: Methane is said to be hydrophobic.
The substance is extremely hydrophobic and therefore exhibits some unique properties in water.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种物质是异常疏水的,因此在水中出现某些独特的性质.

袜子基本知识 - 宵宵别梦寒的主页 ... 亲水的 hydrophilic 疏水的 hydrophobic 可压缩性 compressibility.
... . . .泥沙fate。这种类型的模拟通过使用一种示踪砂（sediment-bound tracer）来完成。类似于疏水（hydrophobic）污染物（如有机化学物质，重金属或放射性核素） ，它吸附细粒径泥沙粒子。在模拟中这些示踪物是永久吸附泥沙.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from late Latin hydrophobicus, from Greek hudrophobikos, from hudrophobia (see hydrophobia) + -ic

means.word_mean: 1. lacking affinity for water; tending to repel and not absorb water; tending not to dissolve in or mix with or be wetted by water

auth_sentence.content: The difference with NOC on Solar is that we are the thinnest hydrophobic technology on the market.
